mapper.insert: insert into channel_technician (person_id, company_id, person_name, company_name, person_gender, identity_card, birthday, phone, province, city, county, address, job, email, hire_date, qq_num, telephone, review_status, create_time) values (channelTechnican.personId,channelTechnican.companyId,channelTechnican.personName, channelTechnican.companyName,channelTechnican.personGender,channelTechnican.identityCard, channelTechnican.brithday,channelTechnican.phone,channelTechnican.province,channelTechnican.city, channelTechnican.county,channelTechnican.address,channelTechnican.job,channelTechnican.email, channelTechnican.hireDate,channelTechnican.qqNum,channelTechnican.telephone,channelTechnican.reviewStatus, now())
